content:
Hello,

I am going over the FHIR spec. in section 2.14.12 Search Response - http://hl7.org/fhir/overview-dev.html#search-response

Should not the Content-Type (line 3) be application/fhir+json instead of fhir+xml ?

Thanks!
Agree that that's pretty funny looking XML... :smile: Can you submit a technical correction using the "propose a change" link?
